value.string:
"""
 The release signature is a kind of declarative
 specification of an upgrader.
 """
 
 
 BEFORE_TRIGGERED_BT5_SCRIPT_ID_DICT = {
 }
 
 AFTER_TRIGGERED_BT5_SCRIPT_ID_DICT = {
 }
 
 ALARM_DICT = {
 "bt5_upgrader" : True,
 "finalize_upgrader" : True
 }
 
 REQUIRED_BT5_ID_LIST = [
 # core of core
 'erp5_mysql_innodb_catalog',
 'erp5_full_text_myisam_catalog',
 'erp5_mysql_innodb_catalog',
 'erp5_core',
 'erp5_property_sheets',
 'erp5_xhtml_style',
 # erp5
 'erp5_workflow',
 'erp5_configurator',
 'erp5_base',
 'erp5_administration',
 'erp5_accounting',
 'erp5_crm',
 'erp5_accounting_l10n_fr',
 'erp5_dms',
 'erp5_computer_immobilisation',
 'erp5_credential',
 'erp5_commerce',
 'erp5_pdm',
 'erp5_knowledge_pad',
 'erp5_forge',
 'erp5_invoicing',
 'erp5_ingestion',
 'erp5_item',
 'erp5_open_trade',
 'erp5_km',
 'erp5_simulation',
 'erp5_trade',
 'erp5_system_event',
 'erp5_payzen_secure_payment',
 'erp5_web',
 'erp5_project',
 'erp5_credential_oauth2',
 # new erp5 business templates
 'erp5_promise',
 'erp5_web_shacache',
 'erp5_data_set',
 'erp5_web_shadir',
 # slapos brand
 'slapos_configurator',
 'slapos_cache',
 'slapos_cloud',
 'slapos_crm',
 'slapos_hypermedia',
 'slapos_jio',
 'slapos_slap_tool',
 'slapos_category',
 'slapos_rest_api_tool_portal_type',
 'slapos_rest_api',
 'slapos_pdm',
 'slapos_accounting',
 'slapos_payzen',
 'slapos_web',
 'slapos_erp5',
 ]
 
 REINSTALLABLE_BT5_ID_LIST = ()
 
 # items to keep even if marked by BT5 to 'Remove'
 KEEP_ORIGINAL_DICT = {
 'erp5_secure_payment': ( 'portal_secure_payments', ),
 'slapos_cloud': ( 'hosting_subscription_module', 'software_installation_module', 'software_instance_module',
 'portal_types/Hosting Subscription', 'portal_types/Hosting Subscription Module', 'portal_types/Slave Instance',
 'portal_types/Software Installation', 'portal_types/Software Installation Module', 'portal_types/Software Instance',
 'portal_types/Software Instance Module'),
 'slapos_accounting': ( 'portal_types/Subscription Item Root Simulation Rule', ),
 'slapos_payzen': ('portal_types/Payzen Event', 'portal_types/Payzen Event Message',),
 }
 
 # Items which need validation at upgrade time
 VALIDATION_DICT = { }
 
 INTEGRITY_VERIFICATION_SCRIPT_ID_LIST = ( )
 
 ALARM_TOOL_CONFIGURATION_LIST = ( )
 
 #WORKFLOW_CHAIN_DICT = context.getPortalObject().portal_workflow.getWorkflowChainDict()
 #
 #WORKFLOW_CHAIN_DICT.update(**{
 # 'chain_Slave Instance': 'edit_workflow, instance_accounting_slap_interaction_workflow, instance_slap_interface_workflow, item_workflow, local_permission_vifib_interaction_workflow, slap_interaction_workflow',
 # 'chain_Software Instance': 'edit_workflow, instance_accounting_slap_interaction_workflow, instance_slap_interface_workflow, item_workflow, local_permission_vifib_interaction_workflow, slap_interaction_workflow',
 #})
 
 FINALIZE_ALARM_SCRIPT = ( )
 
 # Wrap everything into a dict
 signature_dict = {
 'alarm_dict' : ALARM_DICT
 , 'required_bt5_id_list': REQUIRED_BT5_ID_LIST
 , 'before_triggered_bt5_id_dict': BEFORE_TRIGGERED_BT5_SCRIPT_ID_DICT
 , 'after_triggered_bt5_id_dict': AFTER_TRIGGERED_BT5_SCRIPT_ID_DICT
 , 'reinstalable_bt5_id_list': REINSTALLABLE_BT5_ID_LIST
 , 'keep_original_dict': KEEP_ORIGINAL_DICT
 , 'validation_dict': VALIDATION_DICT
 , 'integrity_verification_script_id_list': INTEGRITY_VERIFICATION_SCRIPT_ID_LIST
 , 'alarm_tool_configuration_list' : ALARM_TOOL_CONFIGURATION_LIST
 # , 'workflow_chain_dict': WORKFLOW_CHAIN_DICT
 # , 'finalize_upgrade_script_list': FINALIZE_ALARM_SCRIPT
 }
 
 if item is not None:
 return signature_dict.get(item, None)
 else:
 return signature_dict
